Reviews.Title: Best for the Price
Reviews.Author: Julia G.
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my husband and I liked it when I was playing with it for a while to set everything up for his needs.... so I bought another one for myself.  I really like the selection of the colors and the camera itself is very easy to use.  One thing I didn't realize until purchasing this camera was the memory card needed for.  This camera has to have a XD card and it's not SD card that most camera uses.  If you own SD card already and not planning to purchase another kind, this camera might not be the right choice but even if buying a new card, price is still be very attractive.

Reviews.Title: wonderful all-purpose affordable easy-to-use
Reviews.Author: Prejzki
Reviews.Content: I had this camera in red and it was recently stolen in a home burglary, so I am looking to replace it asap. I'm not even looking at other brands or models. I am amazed at how the price has dropped since my original purchase, especially if I choose a different color (red is oddly more expensive than the other colors). I took some grainy video when I first got the camera, but after tweaking the settings, it worked very well for me for both video and still-shots. It's easy to use, the menu system is intuitive, and the pics were turning out great for me. It's also compact enough to slip into my purse or pocket.

Reviews.Title: cute camera; doesn't hold up
Reviews.Author: say no to Olympus
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a little over a year ago and liked it so much, I went back to the shop and bought another one for my daughter.  However it is now 13.5 months later and the camera, one month out of warranty, stopped working.  Specifically, the little button that turns on the power jammed and it will not turn on at all.  The local Olympus dealership wants more than the camera cost originally to fix it - he says it is a short in the on off switch.  The camera cost $225 last year and had a lot of nice features but the quality of the workmanship is so poor (despite being a Japanese camera, it is actually made in Vietnam) that I would not buy any other Olympus product after my experience.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Auslander
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife. This is her first digital camera and she loves it. The price was enticing and the camera is very easy to use. It arrived in a timely fashion. I am very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality  = Short Life =  Unhappy Customer
Reviews.Author: M. Griffin
Reviews.Content: Purchased two for Christmas.  One began to malfunction within the first 60 days.  When I attempted to zoom, the lens would pulsate in and out a few times and then the camera would power down.  It would often power down with the lens protruding from the camera.  I returned it to Olympus, but they refused to repair or replace.  Their assessment was the lens was impacted and impacts are not covered under warranty.  I advised that the malfunctioning lens would often not retract into the housing so it is possible that it may have scratches and that is why I was returning it.  From their perspective, it was out of the question that the malfunctioning lens could have occurred first.  I was BLOWN away.  60 days of use, out of $149 and one unhappy 15 year old, now without a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: You get what you get and you don't throw a fit
Reviews.Author: Robert Krenke "Krenkekids"
Reviews.Content: Pretty simple camera to use.  In AUTO it is almost foolproof.  Note the XD card to make sure your computer can handle it.  Battery is rechargeable and the battery pack has a pretty good capacity.  It is pretty fragile so I would recommend a camera case.  In a purse with other media devices: phone, Black Berry, etc... it can get scratched up.

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: Keon B. Billings "Digital Rastaman"
Reviews.Content: The wife uses this one, but I've heard complains for her that it is sometime slow to respond. she likes the size of it, and the color, but generally complain only about the speed. I find that the images are not always as sharp as they could be, and the colors are not always right depending on lighting. Otherwise, its a nice starter camera, or carry for convenience camera that will take better pictures than any phone will.

Reviews.Title: Decent Little Camera
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera beacuse ti was reasonable priced and came in pink. It works pretty well, the pics are nice and the video comes out well too. The only thing I really disliked about it was that fact that it didn't take SD memory cards, so it's not compatible to view pics from other devices. The shutter speed isn't really that great either, I was hoping that buying a new camera would get me quicker shots, but it kind of fell short of my expectations there.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!  :o)
Reviews.Author: N. Wolfe
Reviews.Content: Never did I expect to find a camera for only 95$ that would be so perfect - Great Quality photos, easy to use....  I've had it for over a year now and still no regrets!

Reviews.Title: For a true camera Lover!
Reviews.Author: N. Marilla "Shoe-a-holic"
Reviews.Content: If you love to take pictures, then this is the camera for you.  If you are an AKA then this is the camera for you, not  only is it pink, but it is very small, light weight and stylish.  I carry this camera with me every where I go, no matter the size  of my bag.  And it takes beautiful pictures! I love the self timer feature, I love the picture clarity, I simply love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: James Wolters
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera.  It is surprising to see 5x optical zoom in such a small package.  I got fast M+xD memory and can take unlimited 30fps VGA movies.  The camera is very nice to use in all functions.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the pictures don't look quite as good as on my other (more expensive) cameras.  This may not be fair, but it is still pretty easy to tell which camera took the picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of features for the price. It's a great deal for the price. Reliable, fast, and fun.  I bought two--one for me and one for my family.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!!!
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Whipps
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend wanted this camera badly. I found it at a great price and it's everything she wanted it to be. She uses it all the time, love's it! The seller had it to her pretty much in 2 days...very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Pretty color, crappy camera
Reviews.Author: MissMollyInHeels
Reviews.Content: This camera was very pretty, however the pictures it took were not. There was a very long lag between pressing the button and the actualy shutter click. The pictures were not high quality, and almost every one had terrible red eye. I know some of that is my doing, however I was not impressed. This is a cheap camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
5x image-stabilized optical zoom; Face Detection
Perfect Shot Preview mode
TruePic III image processor
Stores images on xD Picture Cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Pink)
